moves.2... Nc6: Its to protect the e5 pawn
moves.3. Bc4: Opening the bishop and attack the f7 pawn, it depends only by King
moves.3... Bc5: Same attack black did..attack the f2 pawn
moves.4... Nf6: Good move but white can attack f7 pawn by making Ng5
moves.5. d3: Idea to open another bishop and pins the Nf6
moves.7. Nd5: White on his way, super move
moves.7... Bg4: Black already thought about this move so he pins the Knight
moves.8. Bg5: Now Knight can't escape both Nd5 and Bg5 threats well
moves.8... Nd4: Both are in the same way..
moves.9. Re1: Can't guess why he moved 10. Re1
moves.9... Qd7: Is it really the good move?? But think this is very very beautiful and has great idea. No player can't make like this.
moves.10. Bxf6: Good..now black can't 10..gxf6 because 11. Nxf6+ forks the king and Queen
moves.11... Qh3: Great plan, and preplaned move at '10th'. Threats f3 pawn and get quick win
moves.12. Re3: Only this is Better to save f3 pawn
moves.12... gxf6: Black got exchange with more safety and attcking..
moves.13. Nxf6+: Only the move, because 13. f4,, ..Qh6. 14. Rg3+ Kh8, black on safe position with open 'g' file
moves.13... Kh8: Now g file is cleared to attack on white's king..
moves.14. f4: Moving this pawn means, white wants to divert black's Queen from h3
moves.14... Rfg8+: Such a good move, if 15. Nxg8 , ..Rxg8+ threats well
moves.15. Rg3: I can't say this is better, but it can't keep longer. If 15. Nxg8 ..Rxg8+ 16. Rg3 exf4{can't 16..Rxg3+} 17. Rxg8+ Kxg8 18. Kh1 Nf3 19. Qxf3 Qxf3, wins a Queen
moves.16. Qh5: White thinks to get back black's queen , because it had good attack, in this way white going to lose his one rook.. But black had great idea..
moves.16... Rxg3+: 100% right move. Without this, 16.. Qxh5 also playable to win a Rook on g3. But black on advanced trick
moves.18. Qxe2: No other way, have to take
moves.18... fxg3: Now white on single move mate
moves.19. Qf3: Other than 19. Ng4 is also seems good. If 19. Ng4,, gxf2+ 20. Qxf2 Qxg4+ threats well
moves.22... Qh3+:
Not 22..Qxg4?. It is also better.
If 22..Qxg4 23. Be6 fxe6 24. Kh2 Qg3+ 25. Kh1 Qh2# one hand the same, so black moved Qh3+ better..
moves.25... Qf2#: Finally black won. With the help of 9...Qd7
